title: Ask an Australian about guns and gun laws
creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Illustrates the effects of careless handling of firearms and explains Australian laws regarding the use of firearms. Also available in Greek, Italian, Serbo Croatian, Spanish and Turkish languages.
